table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
set nocount on declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from wcms_Banner { inner join wcms_PageBanner on [PageBanner_BannerID] = Banner_ID AND [PageBanner_PageID] = @Search:FilterPageID } where Banner_SiteID = @siteID AND Banner_LanguageID = @langID { AND Banner_Title @Search:Banner_Title } ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage select [Banner_ID] ,case [Banner_Type] when 1 then 'Banner' when 100 then 'Background Banner' else 'Logo' end as [Banner_Type] ,'[' + Banner_Title + ']
' + Banner_Content + '
' as [Banner_Title] ,[Banner_O] ,case when [Banner_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [Banner_A] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Banner_ID] ,[Banner_Type] ,[Banner_Title] ,case when [Banner_Content] is not null then [Banner_Content] else '' end as [Banner_Content] ,[Banner_O] ,[Banner_A] from wcms_Banner { inner join wcms_PageBanner on [PageBanner_BannerID] = Banner_ID AND [PageBanner_PageID] = @Search:FilterPageID } where Banner_SiteID = @siteID AND Banner_LanguageID = @langID { AND Banner_Title @Search:Banner_Title } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 AND @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT:
set nocount on
declare @pageList nvarchar(max) set @pageList = '' select @pageList = @pageList + ';' + convert(nvarchar(10), PageBanner_PageID) from wcms_PageBanner where PageBanner_BannerID = @editID if (@pageList <> '') set @pageList = substring(@pageList, 2, len(@pageList) - 1)
select [Banner_ID] ,[Banner_Type] ,[Banner_Title] ,[Banner_Theme] ,[Banner_Content] ,[Banner_O] ,[Banner_A] ,@pageList as [BannerPageList] ,[Banner_Brief] from wcms_Banner where Banner_ID = @editID
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE: update wcms_Banner set [Banner_A]= @active where Banner_ID = @editID select @editID
table.SQL_DELETE: delete wcms_PageBanner where PageBanner_BannerID = @delID delete wcms_Banner where Banner_ID = @delID select 1
